Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor™ System for Rapid Detection of Flu A + B
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A + B utilizing chromatographic immunoassay and electronic reader for detection of influenza A and B antigens in respiratory specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in the direct and qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral antigens from nasopharyngeal wash/aspirate and swab samples in transport media from symptomatic patients to diagnose influenza A and B infections; negative results are presumptive and require confirmation.
